item.title: Using Docker registry for WSO2 images
item.description: Introduction Once we know how to create a Docker image, if we want to share this image with the team, or use it in different environments, itÂ´s possible to export it to a tar file, or use the Dockerfile to build the image on each of the docker hosts where it will be used. Having to rebuild the image on the pc of each of the components of your team is not very practical.
